feed.title: Longzero ~ Long Nguyen
feed.subtitle: My name is Long Nguyen. I am a Front-End Web Developer obsessed with UX. I am experienced in building simple, clean and user-friendly websites for clients across the globe. Reach me on Instagram or Twitter or by email long@longzero.com.

entry.title: School is about grades
entry.summary: Students, don't be fooled. School is about grades. They don't get to say it isn't about grades, then judge you based on grades.

entry.title: COVID-19 Hôpital Maisonneuve-Rosemont (4 janvier 2021)
entry.summary: À l’hôpital Maisonneuve-Rosemont, c’est rendu que la plupart des patients COVID-19 sont des gens qui admettent avoir trichés (pour le retraçage) et il y a beaucoup de cas dont ce sont les enfants qui infectent les adultes (une bonne raison pour garder les écoles fermées).

entry.title: White Fragility
entry.summary: White Fragility on display at the Capitol in DC.

entry.title: Tous les partis supportent les mesures sanitaires
entry.summary: Quand on écoute tous les partis, qu’on soit pour ou contre Trudeau et Legault, tous les autres chefs auraient appliqués plus ou moins les mêmes mesures.

entry.title: “Trump will win”
entry.summary: I wish I posted somewhere in 2016 that “Trump will win”. I wasn't surprised when he did.

entry.summary: Rowan Atkinson on cancel culture and the division of society

entry.title: Les conspirationnistes me font peur
entry.summary: J'ai peur de ce qui peut arriver au Québec dans un futur proche, pas à cause de la COVID-19, mais à cause des humains.

entry.title: Looking for ways to volunteer for research on mental health issues
entry.summary: I suppose one key to use against mental health issues is acceptance of oneself.

entry.title: Pay it forward
entry.summary: Pay it forward. I don’t believe if I do something for you, it means you have to do something for me and vice versa. I believe in paying it forward.

entry.title: Éducation en ligne
entry.summary: Avec l’éducation en ligne, on voit clairement que le coût payé n’est que pour un diplôme—un morceau de papier, parce que peu importe ce qu’on veut apprendre, on peut déjà l’apprendre sur le web gratuitement avec YouTube ou des gens passionnés qui écrivent des articles ou bien en payant sur des sites comme LinkedIn Learning et Skillshare.

entry.title: District 31 et Black Lives Matter
entry.summary: District 31.

entry.title: Triple fracture caused by loss of balance and my electric unicycle smashing my leg
entry.summary: Somehow, my big toe on the right foot broke as well.

entry.title: Going out alone
entry.summary: Heck, even when I don't go out alone, people can just go talk to people and I will be just fine. I am very capable of being alone in a group. I am judging everybody silently and it is very entertaining.

entry.title: Online education
entry.summary: With online education on the rise, exacerbated by the pandemic, we can see that the cost of university is merely for a diploma—a piece of paper, because whatever we want to learn, we can do it for free through YouTube or articles written by passionate professionals. We can also do it at a cost on reputable websites like LinkedIn Learning and Skillshare.

entry.title: Thinking about my life thus far
entry.summary: Pleasantly thinking about all sorts of moments in my life and quite satisfied with this life so far. Hoping you are satisfied with your life too.

entry.title: Health over politics
entry.summary: Je trouve ça très réconfortant, parce qu'aux États-Unis, il y a un parti qui délire complètement.

entry.title: Cars honking at bikes
entry.summary: J'ai vu de loin un automobiliste klaxonner après un cycliste pour aucune raison sauf pour dire «Va plus vite» ou «Dégage de mon chemin».

entry.title: Traffic isn't caused by anything other than those who are in it
entry.summary: I encourage you to remember when you were a younger person before you could drive a car, remember how you went from one place to another.

entry.title: Tibia/Fibula frature • Progress on week 9 day 2
entry.summary: It is now the beginning of week 9 and I can mount and unmount my electric unicycle without holding on to anything.

entry.title: A sequel to The Social Dilemma documentary?
entry.summary: Going through this article is like reading a sequel to the documentary The Social Dilemma.

entry.title: 12 weeks living in a car and some thoughts about community and individualism
entry.summary: My upcoming journey is freaking me out!

entry.title: A website for Jennifer Santiago
entry.summary: One of the things I really like about this project is that I was making a website for someone who does a lot of things and she wanted to put them all on display. Usually, I get projects that are just about one thing; a movie, photography, music, fashion, humor, writing, dancing, etc. As much as I hate creating forms, I even had fun building hers. It has been extremely easy to talk to her and I believe it’s been easy for her to talk to me too.

entry.title: All in, without hesitation and without reluctance
entry.summary: I was single, with no kids and my entourage was healthy. The most important things in my life were covered, so ultimately, there was no reason for me to deviate from the path I needed to be on.

Freaking out about car camping for the next few months
entry.summary: My upcoming journey is freaking me out!

entry.title: An unexpected NYE
entry.summary: An unexpected NYE.

entry.title: Calling out sexual harassment
entry.summary: In 2018, in this era, I believe men should talk about sexual harassment among themselves. The news always approaches the topic from the same angle: “This person was charged with sexual assault” and “That person was charged with sexual assault”. It never educates. Some men are just oblivious about what they’re doing. The conversation should go beyond what’s in the news.

entry.title: Cobra Kai Season 3
entry.summary: 2021 starts with the release of season 3 of Cobra Kai on Netflix. I binged-watched it and it turned out to be a great way to start the year.

entry.title: Drink less when things go wrong
Do you sleep well?
entry.summary: I value the quality of my sleep more than the quantity of my sleep.

entry.summary: What I mean by that is people jaywalking all over the place and drivers of all sorts of vehicles swifting through the streets.

entry.summary: I bought a phone for less than 500$ before taxes and there is another even better one for cheaper, except for the camera.

entry.title: If you want to live longer, work more
entry.summary: It seems there are many people, young and old, who think of retirement as a requirement for you to feel like you’re free and (finally) living.

entry.title: “I’m still at war.”
entry.summary: This is a story beyond war. It is a story about understanding, acceptance, forgiveness, peace and love.

entry.title: I didn't want to watch Don't Look Up, because I know reality
entry.summary: Sure, start small, but at this point, as we are starting 2022, you will have to move fast to keep up, not with other humans, but with the environment.

entry.title: Keep your website from being framed
entry.summary: All you need is a small piece of JavaScript in the <head> section of your HTML code.

entry.title: Kill your TODO list and put everything in your calendar
entry.summary: Next, let’s talk about sleep and scheduling everything and playing Tetris. I’ve come to see everything I do and have to do as Tetris blocks and my entire life is the Tetris board and when I die, it means I have more than I can handle and that’s game over.

entry.title: Nothing is too small
entry.summary: This isn’t my story; it’s a translation of this Facebook post.

entry.title: Opening hours of social media
entry.summary: What really caught my attention in the article was a response from British Airways: “Sorry for the delay in responding, our twitter feed is open 09:00-17:00 GMT.” That line is completely ridiculous. The web doesn’t turn off. Social media does not close. You can go to sleep, but the web will continue to change with new tweets, new Facebook statuses and new Instagram pictures. Websites all over the world keep getting updated every second.

entry.title: Mortal Kombat 2021, quick review
entry.summary: This movie is like watching your friends play the game, then they do an impressive fatality and you go “Holy crap! Daaaamn!”

entry.title: Rebekka’s website, the design (2 of 2)
entry.summary: “if i have a site done i want it to be very simple, user friendly to the point” is what Rebekka told me.

entry.title: Rebekka’s website, the beginnings (1 of 2)
entry.summary: I decided to contact her again, over a year later, in August 2006. Why a year later? Because Rebekka has actually become a talented photographer and after June 2005, I got very busy with school and I was handling a few design jobs and giving tutoring lessons. So I sent Rebekka exactly the same offer again. She answered a few days later mentioning that she liked what I did for someone else. These words usually make every freelancer smile: “yeah, i gratefully accept your offer:)” The game was on.

entry.title: Respect + Happiness is contagious
entry.summary: Happiness is fucking contagious.

entry.summary: The Morning Show Season 2 is matches with reality.

entry.title: Snow off sidewalks first; off streets later
entry.summary: There’s a lot of snow this morning and it reminds me of a conversation I was listening to during the holidays, between people with more life experience than me.

entry.title: Tai chi and beef
entry.summary: Je ne devrais pas vous blâmer pour la destruction de la forêt amazonienne et les changements climatiques? Are you shitting me? YOUR DEMAND for meat is causing this shithole!

entry.title: Testing Google’s Recorder
entry.summary: The transcript feature has incredible accuracy and it’s my favourite thing about the app. In this test, I tried different accents and inserted “uh…” and pauses here and there and it ignores them successfully.

entry.title: The basic principle of contracts
entry.summary: I hate contracts. I am not indifferent, I do not not like them, I completely hate them. Contract is one word to say “there is lack of trust and reliability”.

entry.title: YouTube thumbnail sizes and URL to get them
Website - Atlantic City International Film & Music Festival
entry.summary: It isn’t everyday that I get the chance to work on the website of a festival. In fact, for this one, it was never part of the plan for me to do it, one had already been done. I was asked what I thought of it and I remember that one of things I said was “It looks like something coming from the last century”. I would find it quite harsh if someone said that about one of my designs, but it was true. I found out that the person behind the previous design was in the business for much longer than I am, but I have the feeling that he doesn’t stay up to date with current trends. Unfortunately, since then, that previous design is gone. Even the domain name was poorly chosen; it just wasn’t memorable.

entry.title: Une roue pour les gouverner toutes
entry.summary: Après 36 heures de recherches de transports alternatifs et de vidéos sur YouTube, j’ai vraiment hâte à mon prochain geste écologique.

entry.title: Uber Eats takes 30% of restaurants’s cut
entry.summary: Depuis le début de la pandémie, je vous encourage à éviter les compagnies de livraisons de bouffe. Encore une fois, je vous encourage à éviter les compagnies de livraisons de bouffes.
